data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Plaines Wilhems that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Plaines Wilhems, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 35,844 believers in Plaines Wilhems.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.section_summary: On average, 31 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Plaines Wilhems, Mauritius.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, it’s possible most of the 249,012 lost people in  Plaines Wilhems, Mauritius have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Plaines Wilhems, Mauritius.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Plaines Wilhems, Mauritius today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who are far from you in Plaines Wilhems. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 35,844 believers in the state of Plaines Wilhems the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
